ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The author wish to thank Huafang Lai, Junyun He, Gary Morris, Bingying Jiang, Linh Nguyen, Julie Featherston, Kadie Gavan, Darin Stone, Yihuang Lu, and other members of our laboratory for contributing to plant material generation, leaf infiltration, protein analysis, and microscopy. The critical reading of the manuscript by Joseph Caspermeyer is greatly appreciated. The research was supported in part by an NIAID grant # 1U01AI075549 to QC.
